entry.title: [ERI][DedicatedServers] - Electrical maintenance
entry.content:
Nov 10, 08:16 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 10, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 26, 20:38 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/11/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 10/11/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the following racks may be unavailable for up to 15 minutes :
E105C12/E105C11/E105B10/E105B09/E105A08/E105A03/E105A01/E105A04/E105A02/E103A18/E103A17
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we carry out energy tests on the network equipment in our racks
